name: MAELOVE Glow Maker Vitamin C Serum with Vitamin E, Ferulic Acid & Hyaluronic Acid, Award-Winning Brightening and Hydrating Facial Serum, Unscented, 1.0 fl oz
short_description: THE GOLD STANDARD FORMULA: Glow Maker uses the optimum 15% L-ascorbic acid, Vitamin E, and Ferulic Acid trio, formulated at the correct pH. It’s the same proven core science as the iconic $185 brand, without the markup.

ABSORBS IN SECONDS: Our light-as-water formula sinks in immediately, so you can apply SPF or makeup right away. No sticky feel, no residue, and no hot-dog smell, just skin that feels hydrated, smooth, and ready.

FOR SENSITIVE SKIN: High-potency Vitamin C shouldn’t sting or burn. Glow Maker is designed to deliver visible results without the usual irritation, helping keep skin calm, comfortable, and free from redness.
COLD-STORED FOR FRESHNESS: To help preserve potency, we make Glow Maker in small batches and store every bottle in a certified cold storage facility to slow oxidation and keep Vitamin C fresh.

1.7 MILLION BOTTLES SOLD: A long-time favorite of dermatologists and beauty editors since 2017, with over 500,000 customers worldwide. Trusted for consistent results and a brighter-looking complexion with regular use.

Potent, non-irritating face serum is tested across skin types & tones. With a Patented Micro-Peptide Technology developed with dermatologists, 2x smaller than leading anti-aging peptides which only sit on the surface of skin to help build collagen

name: Vanicream Vitamin C Serum, 1.2 Fl Oz, Formulated without Common Irritants for Sensitive Skin, Milky and Lightweight Brightening Serum, Hydrates & Boosts Glow, Dermatologist-Tested
short_description: Made for Sensitive Skin: Vanicream is the #1 dermatologist-recommended Brand for Sensitive Skin*. This milky vitamin C face serum absorbs quickly to enhance the skin’s brightness for a fresh glow and fits seamlessly into any skin care regimen
Ceramide-Enriched Hydration: This lightweight vitamin C serum for face contains key ceramides that help improve moisture retention, leaving dull, uneven skin feeling soft, smooth, and hydrated
Stable Vitamin C Derivative: Packaged in an airless pump, this formula is much less likely to oxidize or change color, so it lasts longer than many other Vitamin C serums

No Common Irritants: This non-irritating face serum has a mild, unscented formula and contains no gluten, fragrance, dye, lanolin, parabens, formaldehyde releasers, botanical extracts, essential oils, or other common skin irritants
Won’t Clog Pores: Carefully formulated to be non-comedogenic, this hydrating serum helps support skin prone to sensitivity or eczema.
product_description: Vanicream Vitamin C Serum for Glowy Skin The Vanicream Vitamin C Serum is a lightweight, milky formula designed to refresh and enhance the skin's brightness. Powered by a potent yet gentle vitamin C derivative and enriched with ceramides, it helps even skin tone, restore radiance, and support skin barrier health. The serum absorbs quickly, making it an easy addition to your daily routine. Formulated with sensitive skin in mind, this serum is formulated without dyes, fragrance, masking fragrance, lanolin, parabens, and formaldehyde releasers. It’s non-comedogenic and pH-balanced, offering a skin-friendly boost without clogging pores or causing redness. Dermatologist-tested, it’s suitable for those who struggle with traditional vitamin C products. Packaged in an airless pump to help protect the formula from oxidation, the serum stays fresh and stable for longer use. Whether used morning or night, it delivers gentle care your skin can trust. Follow with sunscreen after morning use. Trust Vanicream, the #1 Dermatologist Recommended Brand for Sensitive Skin*, for your family's skincare needs. With over 50 years of expertise, our primary purpose is to make products for people with sensitive skin. *Source IQVIA ProVoice Survey, 12 months ending July 2024. Packaging may vary.

name: Eva Naturals Vitamin C Serum for Face – Anti Aging Dark Spot Remover with Retinol, Hyaluronic Acid, Niacinamide & Salicylic Acid – Face Serum for Women for Clear, Smooth, Radiant Skin
short_description: MULTI-ACTIVE FACE SERUM FOR RADIANT, HEALTHY SKIN: Simplify your routine with this powerful all-in-one face serum, packed with Vitamin C, Retinol, Niacinamide, and Salicylic Acid to support smoother texture, even tone, and visibly clear skin. Perfect for women seeking a streamlined regimen that addresses fine lines, dullness, breakouts, and rough patches all at once. Ideal for daily use, this potent serum helps reveal a fresh, radiant-looking complexion — without irritation or excess steps.

FADES DARK SPOTS WITHOUT HARSH INGREDIENTS: Target the appearance of dark spots, acne scars, and hyperpigmentation with gentle, effective ingredients like Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Niacinamide, and Rosehip Seed Oil. This formula helps even skin tone, reduce redness, and restore a smooth, luminous look. Free from harsh bleaches or hydroquinone, this face serum is suitable for all skin types, including sensitive or acne-prone skin, and supports a more balanced, glowing complexion.

INTENSE HYDRATION WITH BOTANICAL HYALURONIC ACID & SQUALANE: Experience long-lasting hydration that plumps and softens dry or dull skin. Our serum features Botanical Hyaluronic Acid from Indian Senna and non-comedogenic Squalane to lock in moisture and improve skin elasticity. The lightweight texture absorbs quickly, delivering deep hydration without clogging pores. Use daily to restore your skin’s natural moisture barrier, reduce the look of fine lines, and maintain a supple, dewy glow.

SMOOTHS WRINKLES & SUPPORTS FIRMNESS WITH RETINOL + MSM: Defy visible signs of aging with a targeted blend of Retinol and MSM. This skin-loving duo helps refine rough texture, soften fine lines, and promote collagen production for firmer, smoother skin. MSM enhances nutrient absorption and reduces inflammation, while Retinol boosts cell turnover and elasticity. Ideal for mature, dry, or uneven skin, this serum visibly revitalizes your complexion for a lifted, more youthful appearance over time.

NON-GREASY FORMULA FOR OILY, ACNE-PRONE & SENSITIVE SKIN: Designed for skin that needs balance, this serum combines Salicylic Acid and Tea Tree Oil to help unclog pores, control excess oil, and reduce surface blemishes. Its featherlight formula won’t leave skin sticky or greasy, making it perfect for layering with other moisturizers or makeup. Whether you’re managing breakouts or looking to maintain clarity, this serum delivers clean, refreshed skin — without heavy residue or dryness.
